articles.title: The Latest: Major media say Gaza staff face starvation as US envoy prepares to host ceasefire talks
articles.description: Four leading news organizations say their journalists in Gaza are facing the threat of starvation as the Israel-Hamas war grinds on.
articles.content: Four leading news organizations said Thursday their journalists in Gaza are facing the threat of starvation as the Israel-Hamas war grinds on, while top U.S. envoy Steve Witkoff was to meet with key negotiators from the Middle East for talks on the l... [7666 chars]
